Question
========

Jody is taking three courses: English, History and Mathematics. Assume the odds that she will receive 1 eight, 2 eights, and 3 eights for these courses are: 0.29, 0.44 and 0,21. Then what is the probability that she will not get any eights at all?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,06
* 0,09
* 0,29
* 0,94

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.06: Correct
* 0.09: Incorrect
* 0.29: Incorrect
* 0.94: Incorrect
